title: One should take breaks
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:classic]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[image one.jpg]]

> = "I'm the leader of the SCP foundation. I don't get breaks" 
> = ~Me, In a tale I'll write eventually about O5-1 deciding to go on vacation. 
Here's my O5-1 design in casual clothing based off the above tale idea. I don't know why I went with the green spiral designs in the background but the final product works, so I don't care.
author: vilsolad
